script: Isn't this lovely? Families enjoying the great outdoors again?
It's been a long wait, but it was worth it.
My husband Herbert and I would come out here every Sunday after mass just to see people together. Every Sunday, without fail, for forty-eight years.
Then... well, you know what happened. People were too scared to go outside unless they had to. A whole generation of children, raised to play indoors all day.
Children need room to grow, you know. I don't know how they didn't shrink being so confined.
__(You spent more time outside over four years than some people do their entire lives, and it didn't do much to help your growth.)
But, it looks like people are finally coming out again. It's not nearly as many as before, but it's getting there.
Maybe once the Sydan sires an heir, you'll get to see what this spot was like at its prime. I know I'd like to see that one last time.
leader_wear=acc_harem_robe++So would you please tell the Sydan to get on that, kind faithful?
That'd be nice.
Sand-humpers...
Loud Girl__Daddy! Papa! Bubby's trying to pull my hair again!
Lying Boy__Am not!
Bald Man__Hun, your spawn are fighting again, could you make them stop? It's hard to nap.
Bearded Man__What do you mean, MY spawn? You're the one who made them!
Bald Man__And you're the one who stays home with them.
Bearded Man__Also your choice!
Loud Girl__Daddy!
Bearded Man__Boy, you leave your sister's tails alone or I'm shaving your head!
Lying Boy__...OK, Daddy.
Bald Man__Very efficient, 'daddy'.
Bearded Man__Don't you start.
Bearded Man__Don't even think about trying to pull her hair again, boy.
Lying Boy__I ain't, Daddy!
Loud Boy__Mama! There's a weird guy staring at us! Make him go away!
Oh, oh, oh dear.
Excuse me, you haven't seen my coin purse around here anywhere, have you?
My job is talking to you.
Wait, you have? Please, please *give* it to me!
Oh, oh shades, my wife is going to KILL me if she finds out I lost it. Please, help me look for it. I must've lost somewhere between here and my home to the west.
Oh, Ohhhhh!!! That's it! You found it! Where was it!?
At... back at my house? This entire time?
...Well, either way, you're a hero! Here, it's not much, but take this!
